mapper.select:
select * from ( select u.user_no userid, u.user_name, null bz, IFNULL(sum(pcm.moneyamountpaid),0) complete, u.cid, 0 type from sys_user u inner join sys_user_dep qud on qud.user_id=u.user_no and qud.dep_id='402881b757417af40157417f62eb0009' left join md_peispatient p on p.id_opendoctor=u.user_no and p.dateregister >= #{yearStart} and p.dateregister <= #{yearEnd} and p.hospitalcode=u.cid left join md_peispatientcharge pcm on pcm.patientcode=p.patientcode and (pcm.is_add is null or pcm.is_add=0) where u.del_flag = 0 group by u.user_no, u.user_name, u.cid
union all
select u.user_no userid, u.user_name, '服务单' bz, IFNULL(sum(pcm.moneyamountpaid),0) complete , p.hospitalcode cid, 0 type from sys_user u inner join sys_user_dep qud on qud.user_id=u.user_no and qud.dep_id='402881b757417af40157417f62eb0009' inner join md_peispatient p on p.id_opendoctor=u.user_no and p.dateregister >= #{yearStart} and p.dateregister <= #{yearEnd} inner join md_peispatientcharge pcm on pcm.patientcode=p.patientcode and (pcm.is_add is null or pcm.is_add = 0 ) inner join sys_user_branch qub on qub.user_id = u.user_no and qub.branch_id = p.hospitalcode where u.cid!=p.hospitalcode and u.del_flag = 0 group by u.user_no , u.user_name, p.hospitalcode ) as aaaa order by user_name
